There are 4 types of “dumb rules” says @donberwick
1️⃣ Old habits 2️⃣ Administrative decisions 3️⃣ Myths; people think it’s a rule but it isn’t 4️⃣ Stupid statutes, which can’t be changed
Analysing 360 dumb rules submitted to the IHI we found that 85% were 1-3 & COULD be changed https://t.co/C6yK8OM6Th
